appDescription: Fluirzen is a guided breaks app that helps reduce stress and increase focus in just 5 minutes. Simple mindfulness, no distractions, no robotic voices. Breathe, read, and return to work with more clarity and balance.
heroText:
5-minute guided breaks to reduce stress and increase focus.
No complications - just breathe, read, and recharge.
aboutParagraphOne:
FluirZen is an active breaks app made by developers, for professionals like you. We offer 5-minute text-guided meditations designed to fit your routine without complications.
No hidden subscriptions, no robotic voices. Just efficient mindfulness for your day.
aboutParagraphTwo: Our frontend is open-source (available on GitHub), because we believe in transparency and community. Use the ambient sounds, read the instructions at your own pace, and return to work refreshed.
ourTeamInfo: Meet the team behind Fluirzen's development and maintenance, you can contact them on LinkedIn.
